name: Meeting with the Master
tooltip:
Meeting with the Master

There was a time when I could ask whatever I wished from those who sought out my master.  But now, you need only ask and I will send you to him.

It is upsetting to me, but I do not question his orders.  I can only take enjoyment in making fun of the ridiculous clothes you wear or the pathetic look on your face.  Even that bores me...

Even this rambling bores me!  Do you wish to see my master or not?
